sqlList.sql: select distinct tu.userid AS TELPHONE,tlu.devicetoken AS DEVICETOKEN,tp.amount, '0' AS TYPE from T_LM_TICKET_RULE tr inner join T_LM_TICKET tlt on tlt.ticketrulecode = tr.ticketrulecode and tlt.status in ('1','2') and trunc(TO_DATE(tr.ENDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')-TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')) = 7 inner join T_LM_TICKET_PACKAGE tp on tlt.packagecode=tp.packagecode inner join T_LM_TICKET_USER tu on tu.packagecode = tp.packagecode and tu.status='0' inner join t_Lm_User tlu on tu.userid=tlu.login_mobile and tlu.devicetoken is not null union all select distinct tu.userid AS TELPHONE,tlu.devicetoken AS DEVICETOKEN,tp.amount, '1' AS TYPE from T_LM_TICKET_RULE tr inner join T_LM_TICKET tlt on tlt.ticketrulecode = tr.ticketrulecode and tlt.status in ('1','2') and trunc(TO_DATE(tr.ENDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')-TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')) = 14 inner join T_LM_TICKET_PACKAGE tp on tlt.packagecode=tp.packagecode inner join T_LM_TICKET_USER tu on tu.packagecode = tp.packagecode and tu.status='0' inner join t_Lm_User tlu on tu.userid=tlu.login_mobile and tlu.devicetoken is not null

select USERID,TELPHONE,DEVICETOKEN,version,regchanel_code,platform_code,CLIENT_CODE,max(ticketusercode) AS ticketusercode, '0' AS TYPE from ( select distinct tlu.id AS USERID, tlu.login_mobile AS TELPHONE, tlu.DEVICETOKEN, tlu.version, tlu.regchanel_code, tlu.platform_code, tlu.CLIENT_CODE,tu.ticketusercode, '0' AS TYPE from T_LM_TICKET_RULE tr inner join T_LM_TICKET tlt on tlt.ticketrulecode = tr.ticketrulecode and tlt.status in ('1','2') and trunc(TO_DATE(tr.ENDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')-TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')) = 7 inner join T_LM_TICKET_PACKAGE tp on tlt.packagecode=tp.packagecode inner join T_LM_TICKET_USER tu on tu.packagecode = tp.packagecode and tu.status='0' inner join t_Lm_User tlu on tu.userid=tlu.login_mobile and tlu.devicetoken is not null and tlu.version >= '3.2' ) dt group by USERID,TELPHONE,DEVICETOKEN,version,regchanel_code,platform_code,CLIENT_CODE,TYPE

select USERID,TELPHONE,DEVICETOKEN,version,regchanel_code,platform_code,CLIENT_CODE,max(ticketusercode) AS ticketusercode, '1' AS TYPE from ( select distinct tlu.id AS USERID, tlu.login_mobile AS TELPHONE, tlu.DEVICETOKEN, tlu.version, tlu.regchanel_code, tlu.platform_code, tlu.CLIENT_CODE,tu.ticketusercode, '0' AS TYPE from T_LM_TICKET_RULE tr inner join T_LM_TICKET tlt on tlt.ticketrulecode = tr.ticketrulecode and tlt.status in ('1','2') and trunc(TO_DATE(tr.ENDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')-TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')) = 14 inner join T_LM_TICKET_PACKAGE tp on tlt.packagecode=tp.packagecode inner join T_LM_TICKET_USER tu on tu.packagecode = tp.packagecode and tu.status='0' inner join t_Lm_User tlu on tu.userid=tlu.login_mobile and tlu.devicetoken is not null and tlu.version >= '3.2' ) dt group by USERID,TELPHONE,DEVICETOKEN,version,regchanel_code,platform_code,CLIENT_CODE,TYPE
